screen.name: historical_data_screen
screen.description: Displays historical weather data for a selected location.

components.description: Displays historical weather data for the selected location.
Date picker for selecting the start date of historical data.
Date picker for selecting the end date of historical data.
Button to confirm the selected date range and update historical data display.
Button to open the meteorological parameter selection interface.
Multi-select component for choosing meteorological parameters for historical data analysis.
Displays a chronological list of past severe weather alerts.
Displays detailed information for a selected severe weather alert.
Tabs for navigating between different historical data views.

component_instances.description: Displays historical weather data for the selected location.
Date picker for selecting the start date of historical data.
Date picker for selecting the end date of historical data.
Button to confirm the selected date range and update historical data display.
Button to open the meteorological parameter selection interface.
Multi-select component for choosing meteorological parameters for historical data analysis.
Displays a chronological list of past severe weather alerts.
Displays detailed information for a selected severe weather alert.
Tabs for navigating between different historical data views.

supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.
supported_props.name: onClick

supported_props.description: Visual style of the button (e.g., solid, outline, ghost).
supported_props.name: variant

component_types.name: DatePicker
component_types.description: A component for selecting a single date.

supported_props.description: The currently selected date in ISO format or similar
supported_props.name: value

supported_props.description: Callback function when the date changes
supported_props.name: onChange

supported_props.description: Label for the date picker, e.g., "Start Date"
supported_props.name: label

component_types.name: HistoricalDataPanel
component_types.description: A panel component to display historical weather data for a selected location.

supported_props.description: Array of historical weather data points.
supported_props.name: data

supported_props.description: The name of the location for which data is displayed.
supported_props.name: location

component_types.name: MultiSelect
component_types.description: A multi-select component for selecting multiple options from a list.

supported_props.description: Array of objects, each with a label and a value for the options.
supported_props.name: options

supported_props.description: Callback function when the selected values change.
supported_props.name: onChange

supported_props.description: Overall label for the multi-select component.
supported_props.name: label

component_types.name: AlertDetailsPanel
component_types.description: A panel component to display detailed information for a selected severe weather alert.

supported_props.description: The alert object containing details to display.
supported_props.name: alert

component_types.name: AlertList
component_types.description: A list component to display a chronological list of severe weather alerts.

supported_props.description: Array of alert objects, each containing alert details.
supported_props.name: alerts

supported_props.description: Callback function when an alert item is clicked.
supported_props.name: onAlertClick

component_types.name: Tabs
component_types.description: A container component for organizing content into multiple tabbed sections.

supported_props.description: The index of the tab to be open by default.
supported_props.name: defaultIndex

supported_props.description: Callback function when the active tab changes.
supported_props.name: onChange
